title: Authorize Response
description: A message containing account information for the holder of that token.

authorize.title: Authorization Response
authorize.description: Account information for the holder of the token.

account_list.description: List of accounts for current user.

excluded_until.description: Epoch of date till client has excluded him/herself from the website, only present if client is self excluded.

is_disabled.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether the account is marked as disabled or not.

is_virtual.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether the account is a virtual-money account.

landing_company_name.description: Landing company shortcode the account belongs to.

loginid.description: The account id of specified account.

fullname.description: User's full name. Will be empty for virtual accounts.

is_virtual.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether the account is a virtual-money account.

landing_company_fullname.description: Landing company name the account belongs to.

landing_company_name.description: Landing company shortcode the account belongs to.

loginid.description: The account ID that the token was issued for.

upgradeable_landing_companies.description: List of landing company shortcodes the account can upgrade to.

req_id.description: ID used to map request to response, present only when the request contains req_id.
